alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Charleston; Coastal Colleton; Dorchester; Inland Berkeley; Inland Colleton; Tidal Berkeley (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 10:44PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...HAZARDOUS SHOWERS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BEAUFORT, CHARLESTON, COLLETON, BERKELEY AND DORCHESTER COUNTIES... At 1044 PM EST, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated hazardous showers along a line extending from near Harleyville to near Cottageville to 7 miles southeast of Tybee Island, and moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of these showers include... North Charleston, Mount Pleasant, Summerville, Hilton Head Island, Goose Creek, Hanahan, Beaufort, and Port Royal. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Charleston; Coastal Colleton; Dorchester; Inland Berkeley; Inland Colleton; Tidal Berkeley
